channel.title: Christina Carbone on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Christina Carbone on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: The Best Chicken Marsala
item.description: Ingredients 1/4 cup flour 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/2 teaspoon oregano 4 tablespoons butter 1 cup sliced mushrooms 1 1/2 cup marsala wine 3/4 cup cooking sherry 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts pounded to 1/4” thick Directions In a small bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, and oregano. Coat chicken pieces in mixture and set aside. In large skillet, melt butter in oil over medium heat. Cook chicken until lightly brown.
